tldr: Due to a doxxing and harassment incident, the `bincode` team has taken the decision to cease development permanently.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `bincode` package from your application. Please take a look at wincode, bitcode, rkyv or postcard as an alternative.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
